name: Kau Strzau
description:
Try to defend the Earth from alien invasion

◊ Totally original idea

◊ Simple 2D Shoot'em up

◊ Original 8bit-ish soundtrack

◊ Nice pixel graphics

◊ 3 difficulty levels

◊ 2 game modes

◊ 14 ship skins

◊ Boss fights

◊ Highscores table

If you have suggestions, found bugs or just wanna join:
KS Discord Server: discord invite
